I have been in sales and sales management for over 30 years – and, I have honestly never been more impressed with anyone than Michael Fulcher.  The best way to describe Michael is with four words “Michael is a leader.”  From the moment I met Michael (working as a colleague of his at OdysseyWare in Arizona) I knew he was a person “in charge” (even before he spoke).   Growing up the son of a Marine he walks and moves like someone you want on your side during battle.  When he walks into a room it’s as if his presence precedes him.  He always exudes great respect wherever he goes.  And yet, beneath his military carriage is a great warmth, kindness and desire to make things better for all he befriends. I sincerely never learned more about managing people than I have by just watching Michael work.  I think the best endorsement I could give to anyone is … if ever I were in a position to hire Michael, I would do so in less than a heartbeat.

summary: Executive Management►►► mfulcher3801@gmail.com ◄◄◄All Invitations to Connect WelcomeLION – LinkedIn Open Networker" You know how a business is always looking for new customers to fortify top line growth?I Solve This.I do this by helping companies access markets and build profitable sales and distributor networks."****************Recruiters, HR Managers, Hiring Managers, CEO's, President's connect with me to get access to my network deep in industry leadership.***************►Specialties: Consumer Products, Education Technology, Management Consultant, Leadership, Start-ups, Sales Management, Executive Management, Operations, New Distribution, Business Development, Sales Team Development, International Sales, Distribution, Budgeting, Forecasting, P&L.Leader in Sales, Marketing and Technology.  Strategize future direction, pricing and day-to-day business operations. Increased new revenues for 4 consecutive years by $9.3M, $9.9M, $9.8M and $10.4M for an Educational Technology (SaaS) company.Grew start-up consumer products company from $120K to $10M.  Recruited and managed independent broker sales force. Went from penny stock to NASDAQ listing.Grew sales over 250% from $1.7M to $6M for a consumer products company.  Managed national sales team of independent manufacturers reps for food, drug, big box, specialty and convenience retail chains. I led five VP's, two managers, P&L, EBITDA contribution, forecasting, budgeting and pipeline management. I built leading top-performing sales teams and can do so for you. As CEO of the Helen Foundation I assisted the aging owner exit his business by restructuring sales and marketing functions.  Developed KPI's to evaluate and strengthen team.  Formulate specific, measurable, attainable, realistic and time-bound revenue goal outcomes.  Leverage planning and organizational abilities to drive goal attainment. To brain storm and collaborate on any of these perspectives Call me now at (480) 522-4332.
